cardText.firstCardText: We make many collections for women and kids.They're really comfortable and modern.
cardText.secondCardText: Make modern products that are manufactured with ecological supplies
cardText.thirdCardText: Be unique, feel comfortable. Our products are exclusive and are kwnon for its high quality

bannerPhrase.phrase: Let us to tell you more
bannerPhrase.lead: We care about using natural fibers to create each one of our collections

collapseTitle.collapseTitleOne: Working with people around the world
collapseTitle.collapseTitleThree: Do you have any question?. Let's talk!

collapseText.collapseTextOne: We work everyday to make unique collection. Furthermore, we'd like to let our products abroad. If you are interested about buying some of our products and you live abroad, contact us please
collapseText.collapseTextTwo: Our company works to create unique and beautiful collections. We are always on trend so get them and look different!
collapseText.collapseTextThree: If you have any questions or you want to make an order, you can contact us using our Contact Form in the Roxanlo Page
